### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE social_media_data ( 
  id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  username VARCHAR(255), 
  post TEXT, 
  likes INT, 
  comments INT, 
  sentiment_score FLOAT 
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE social_media_data SET post='Updated post content' WHERE id=1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  sentiment_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE posts (
  post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  post_content TEXT,
  post_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE comments (
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT,
  customer_id INT,
  comment_content TEXT,
  comment_date DATE
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE customers SET sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE customer_id = 1;
